thread.title: The Olympic Park in Rio is a ghost town and its pools are green again - Business Insider
thread.title_full: The Olympic Park in Rio is a ghost town and its pools are green again - Business Insider

author: Jacqui Frank
title: The Olympic Park in Rio is a ghost town and its pools are green again - Business Insider
text:
embed 
Maracan√£ Stadium, which held the opening and closing ceremonies and several of the Rio Olympics' biggest events, is abandoned and plagued by looters, and Julio de Lamare Aquatic Park's warm-up pools are filled with stagnant water that has turned green. Organizer's blame the Olympic Park's troubles on Brazil's recession.
